name: Name
inactive_user_toggle_desc: With this toggle deactivated, the user is inactive and can't access absentify, nor will they receive emails or push notifications. This status is meant for initial setup, as they will still appear on the calendar. Flip this toggle on to activate the user and send them an invitation email.
SendInvitationEmail_description_many: Users will receive an email from us with a link to absentify. If you do not want this at the current time, you will have to send the email to these users manually later.
UserWithoutEmailHeadlineWithoutSubscript: In the Essentials plan you can invite users who do not have an email address.
UserWithoutEmailHeadlineWithSubscription: You can also invite users without an email address.
UserWithoutEmailDescription: You can enter absences and manage the calendar for these employees. These employees cannot log in, be a department manager or approve absences for other employees.
Error_invite_user: Error invite user, please contact the support
cant_be_archived&active: Member can't be activated and archived at the same time
sendMailDesc: The user will receive an email from us with a link to absentify and will start to receive emails in general.
inactive_user: User Inactive: This user will not receive any emails or push notifications and cannot access absentify until their account is activated by an administrator.
Profile_Description: This information will be displayed publicly so be careful what you share.
Administrator_Description: Administrators can access and change everything, including all settings. (Note: After saving, the user must log out and back in again to gain the permissions.)
Archive_User_Description: Archived users will be removed from the calendar and can no longer log in. Unlike inactive users, they will not appear in the calendar. The user can be reaccounted later if needed.
unarchive_User_Description_one: Unarchived user will be added back to the calendar and can log in again.
unarchive_User_Description_other: The {{number}} users will be unarchived and added back to the calendar and can log in again.
activate_User_Description_one: After activation this user will have access to his absentify account and will receive emails and push notifications.
activate_User_Description_other: After activation the {{number}} selected users  will have access to their absentify account and will receive emails and push notifications.
Are_you_sure_you_want_to_archive_this_ac: Are you sure you want to deactivate this account?
Are you sure you want to deactivate these {{number}} accounts?
Schedule_description: It's important to set your schedule correctly, so that when you book time off the deductions are accurate. Add a new work schedule if your hours change.
Delete_User_Description_one: Are you sure you want to delete this account? All of the users data will be permanently removed from our servers forever. This action cannot be undone.
Delete_User_Description_other: Are you sure you want to delete these {{number}} accounts? All of the users data will be permanently removed from our servers forever. This action cannot be undone.
Set_an_E_Mail_for_the_user: Set an E-Mail for the user
Set_an_E_Mail_for_the_user_description: This will be the E-Mail the user will use to log in to the system.
Set_an_E_Mail_for_the_user_description2: Once the user logs in, this is linked to the Microsoft account, the email address can then no longer be changed. Unless it is changed in the Microsoft portal, the account is then synchronized with absentify.
AccountAlreadyExists: A user with this email already exists, a user can only exists once on absentify.
Download_Excel_Template_description: First you need to download our Excel template. This will already be filled with all the data you need to comfortably prepare the import.
Upload_Excel_File_description: If you have filled the Excel correctly, you can now upload it again. Please make sure that all data is filled correctly.
Upload_Excel_File_description_2: We are now validating your data, this may take a moment.
Name: Name
only_desktop: User Import available on desktop only. Not supported on mobile devices.
linear-all-must-agree_description: Approvers are contacted consecutively. If at least one denies the request, it will not be approved.
linear-one-must-agree-description: Approvers are contacted consecutively. If at least one approves the request, it will be approved.
parallel-all-must-agree-description: Approvers are contacted at the same time. If at least one denies the request, it will not be approved.
parallel-one-must-agree-description: Approvers are contacted at the same time. If at least one approves the request, it will be approved.
upgradeT1: You need the 'More than one Approver' add-on to use this feature.
synchronizes-the-managers-from-the-users: Synchronizes the managers from the user's Microsoft profile
how-many-manager-levels-are-to-be-used: How many manager levels are to be used?
import-teams-ad-users-description: You can automatically populate your Excel file with users from Teams and Entra ID (Azure Active Directory) groups. Simply select one or more groups and we will add them to the Excel file, as long as they are not already in absentify. If you don't choose any groups, no users will be added to the Excel file.
import-teams-ad-users: Automatically Populate Excel with Users from Teams and Entra ID (Azure Active Directory) Groups
invalid_Date: The date of the last working day is invalid
attention_needed_desc: This user account is currently set to 'Inactive'. While in this status, the user will not receive any emails or push notifications and cannot access absentify. To fully enable the account, please change the status to 'Active'.
these_allowances_invalid_hours: The following hourly allowances are invalid: {{allowanceNames}}. Please enter time in the HH:MM format, for example, 6:35 for 6 hours and 35 minutes.
the_allowances_invalid_days: The following daily allowances are invalid: {{allowanceNames}}. Please enter the number of days as a number, for example, '7' for 7 days.
the_allowance_not_exist: The specified allowances do not exist: {{allowanceNames}}. Please download the Excel file again to access the latest allowances.
AccountAlreadyExistsInSameWorkspaceActiv: A user with this email address is already active in this workspace.
AccountAlreadyExistsInSameWorkspaceArchi: A user with this email address is already archived in this workspace. Please reactivate the user or use a different email address.
AccountAlreadyExistsInSameWorkspaceInact: A user with this email address is already inactive in this workspace. Please reactivate the user or use a different email address.
AccountAlreadyExistsInOtherWorkspaceAlon: A user with this email address already exists in another workspace. The user needs to delete their current company account to be invited.
Instructions for deleting the company account
AccountAlreadyExistsInOtherWorkspaceWith: A user with this email address already exists in another workspace. Please contact the administrator of the current workspace to remove the user from that workspace.
no_users_found_description: The uploaded Excel file contains no user data. Please ensure the file includes populated data rows and try again.
Subject: Subject
Display_calendar_weeks_description: The calendar weeks displays a number of each calendar week in overview and my calendar.
only_inactive_users_can_be_activated: Only inactive users can be activated
